SEARCH
Package nz.ac.wgtn.swen225.lc.render

Class ImageImplement

java.lang.Object
nz.ac.wgtn.swen225.lc.render.ImageImplement
public class ImageImplement extends Object
responsible for rendering various game elements (tiles, items, actors, and boxes) onto a JPanel, as well as managing background sound and additional effects during the game.

  • Field Summary

      Parameters:
